schedule.purpose: Today is weekday, Emily Johnson's plan of today is to work on a recent project, including several meetings and chat with company CEO.
schedule.schedule: "00:00-06:30": "Sleep", "06:30-07:00": "Wake up and get ready", "07:00-07:30": "Breakfast", "07:30-09:00": "Final adjustments to presentation script", "09:00-09:30": "Commute to office", "09:30-12:30": "Work on pending tasks", "12:30-13:00": "Lunch break", "13:00-14:30": "Continue working on pending tasks", "14:30-15:00": "Prepare for product launching ceremony", "15:00-15:45": "Product launching ceremony", "15:45-16:00": "Q&A Session", "16:00-17:00": "Wrap up meeting with team", "17:00-17:30": "Review emails and correspondence", "17:30-18:00": "Commute back home", "18:00-18:30": "Exercise", "18:30-19:00": "Dinner", "19:00-21:30": "Relax and unwind", "21:30-22:00": "Prepare for tomorrow's tasks", "22:00-23:59": "Free time"}
schedule.event: Dinner at Bonefish Grill; Lunch at The Pink Door; Work on her paintings for her upcoming show; Visit hospital; Reviewing and organizing recent project files; Drink at a bar; Relax and read a book; Take a nap at office; Commute to work by bus

chat_conv:
Alexa:Hello! I'm Coco, your friendly chatbot. How's your day going so far?;
User:Going good but it's pretty tired.
alexa:I see, what made your day tiring?
;User:are just too many soft to do today so I went to school to have a course in the morning and then I have a meeting in the afternoon afterwards my boyfriend went to the airport so I was him and then I come back home there are even more readings.
Alexa:How did the meeting in the afternoon go?;user:Other question: meeting was OK so we are trying to revise our paper it was it was OK;Alexa:Sounds productive.

Alexa:Can you tell me more about your visit to the airport?;user:Yes(positive response) so my boyfriend visited me in Boston and then it's time for him to come back to Elena so he drove actually V drove to the airport so my boyfriend come came back to Elena,

Alexa:How did you feel about your day overall?;user:I/My have pretty complex feeling of the day cause you know my boyfriend went to the airport and laughed to atlander but it was also a really productive day,alexa:I understand. It sounds like a bittersweet day. Thanks for sharing your day with me.
